summary: This is an email exchange between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing a cooperator who has urgent information about Jeffrey Epstein. The email is brief and informal, indicating internal communication about an investigative lead.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender and recipient of the email discussing a cooperator with information about Epstein. The name is not specified, only the title.

events.title: Email about Epstein cooperator
events.description: Assistant United States Attorneys in the SDNY exchange emails about a cooperator who has urgent information regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email between federal prosecutors in the Southern District of New York dated August 28, 2019.
It references a cooperator who possesses 'urgent' information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The tone is informal, suggesting internal coordination on an active investigative matter.
